guideContainer.name: guide1
guideContainer.thankYouMessage: Thank you for submitting the form.

guidetextbox_3679022.jcr:title: Text Box
guidetextbox_3679022._value:
Please click the button "Continue to dashboard" to open the Global Affairs Canada dashboard in a new browser tab.

Please note: it may take 10 seconds or more to retrieve your contact, account and Call for Proposal information.
guidetextbox_3679022.name: txPleaseContinue

fd:scripts.fd:click: [{"script":{"content":"sessionStorage.setItem(\\"eamid\\"\, EAMID.value);\\nwindow.open('/content/dam/formsanddocuments/besco/indexlanding/landingpagedec30afeb2a24a/jcr:content?wcmmode=disabled&afDebug&afAcceptLang=en'\,'_self');\\n\\n/*\\nlocalStorage.setItem(\\"localEAMID\\"\,EAMID.value );\\nvar lsEAMID = localStorage.getItem(\\"localEAMID\\");\\nconsole.log(\\"localStorage.localEAMID - x: \\"+ lsEAMID);\\n\\nvar ssEAMID = sessionStorage.getItem(\\"EAMID\\");\\nconsole.log(\\"y-sessionStorage-EAMID: \\"+ ssEAMID);\\n\\nvar newhref = \\"https://aemosgidev05:4503/content/forms/af/besco/indexlanding/landingpagenov19a.html?uid=\\" + ssEAMID;\\nconsole.log(\\"newhref: \\"+newhref);\\n*/\\n//document.location.href=\\"https://aemosgidev05:4503/content/forms/af/besco/indexlanding/landingpagenov19a.html\\";//bb oct20;\\n//try guidelib.util.GuideUtil.navigateToURL('/content/dam/formsanddocuments/ceci/registration_form/jcr:content?wcmmode=disabled'\,'_self');\\n//document.location.href=newhref;//bb oct20;\\n\\n//Below opens in NEW tab --> Works nicely\\n//guidelib.util.GuideUtil.navigateToURL('/content/dam/formsanddocuments/besco/indexlanding/landingpagedec30ajan29a/jcr:content?wcmmode=disabled'\,'_self');\\n//guidelib.util.GuideUtil.navigateToURL('/content/dam/formsanddocuments/besco/indexlanding/landingpagedec30a/jcr:content?wcmmode=disabled'\,'_self');\\n//guidelib.util.GuideUtil.navigateToURL('/content/dam/formsanddocuments/besco/indexlanding/landingpagenov19a/jcr:content?wcmmode=disabled'\,'_self');\\n//window.open('/content/dam/formsanddocuments/ceci/proposal_form_new/jcr:content?wcmmode=disabled&mode=new&afAcceptLang='+lang\,'_self');\\n\\n//below jump opens form INSIDE frame\\n//window.open('/content/dam/formsanddocuments/besco/indexlanding/landingpagedec30ajan29a/jcr:content?wcmmode=disabled'\,'_self');\\n//window.open('/content/dam/formsanddocuments/besco/indexlanding/landingpagedec30a/jcr:content?wcmmode=disabled'\,'_self');\\n//window.open('/content/dam/formsanddocuments/besco/indexlanding/landingpagejan25a/jcr:content?wcmmode=disabled'\,'_self');\\n\\n//document.location.href=\\"http://aemosgidev04:4502/content/forms/af/besco/indexlanding/landingpagenov9a.html?uid=qwerty\\";\\n\\n"\,"event":"Click"\,"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.btShowLocalStorageGuidlibNavigateToURL"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]

guidetextbox.name: EAMID

fd:scripts.fd:init: [{"script":{"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.EAMID"\,"event":"Initialize"\,"model":{"nodeName":"EVENT_SCRIPTS"}\,"content":"//This code correctly gets the UID- Enrique\\nconsole.log(\\"11122Perez\\");\\nvar uid = location.search.split(\\"uid=\\")[1]; // UID from URL\\nthis.value = uid;\\nconsole.log(\\"uid-bb:\\"+uid);\\n\\n//besco-Nov9\\nlocalStorage.setItem(\\"localEamID\\"\, uid);\\nconsole.log(\\"bb1\\");\\nvar x = localStorage.getItem(\\"localEamID\\");\\nconsole.log(\\"localStorage.localEamID - x: \\"+x);\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n/*\\nconsole.log(window.parent.document.getElementById(\\"uid\\").value);\\nconsole.log(window.top.document.getElementById(\\"uid\\").value);\\nconsole.log(\\"UID: \\" + uid); \\nconsole.log(\\"enrique3\\");\\n*/"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":false}]

fd:scripts.fd:click: [{"script":{"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.btShowLocalStorage"\,"event":"Click"\,"model":{"nodeName":"EVENT_SCRIPTS"}\,"content":"//besco-Jan7a\\nconsole.log(\\"btShowLocalStorage - Clickb\, \\"+EAMID.value);\\nlocalStorage.setItem(\\"myEAMID\\"\, EAMID.value);\\nvar x = localStorage.getItem(\\"myEAMID\\");\\nconsole.log(\\"myEAMID:\\"+ x);\\nlocalStorage.test = EAMID.value;\\nsessionStorage.junk = 3;\\nconsole.log(\\"localStorage.test = \\"+localStorage.test);\\nconsole.log(\\"sessionStorage.junk = \\"+sessionStorage.junk);\\n\\nlocalStorage.setItem(\\"localEAMID\\"\,EAMID.value );\\n/* Test\\nvar x = localStorage.getItem(\\"localEAMID\\");\\nconsole.log(\\"localStorage.localEAMID - x: \\"+x);\\n// End Test\\n\\nvar vEamid = localStorage.getItem(\\"localEAMID\\");\\nconsole.log(\\"vEamid(localEAMID): \\"+vEamid);\\n\\n//Nov16\\nvar newhref = \\"https://aemosgidev05:4503/content/forms/af/besco/indexlanding/landingpagenov9a.html?uid=\\" + vEamid;\\nconsole.log(\\"newhref: \\"+newhref);\\n\\n//document.location.href=\\"https://aemosgidev05:4503/content/forms/af/besco/indexlanding/landingpagenov9a.html\\";//bb oct20;\\n\\n/*Nov16\\n\\ndocument.location.href=newhref;//bb oct20;\\n*/\\n\\n//document.location.href=\\"http://aemosgidev04:4502/content/forms/af/besco/indexlanding/landingpagenov9a.html?uid=qwerty\\";\\n\\n\\n"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]

[{"script":{"content":"\\n// * console.log(\\"hello\\");\\nlocalStorage.test = 2;\\nsessionStorage.junk = 3;\\nconsole.log(\\"localStorage.test = \\"+localStorage.test);\\nconsole.log(\\"sessionStorage.junk = \\"+sessionStorage.junk);\\n/*\\n// get key\\nalert( localStorage.test ); // 2\\n\\n// remove key\\ndelete localStorage.test;\\n*/\\n//besco-Nov16\\nlocalStorage.setItem(\\"localEAMID\\"\,EAMID.value );\\n// Test\\nvar x = localStorage.getItem(\\"localEAMID\\");\\nconsole.log(\\"localStorage.localEAMID - x: \\"+x);\\n// End Test\\n\\nvar vEamid = localStorage.getItem(\\"localEAMID\\");\\nconsole.log(\\"vEamid(localEAMID): \\"+vEamid);\\n\\n//Nov16\\n\\nvar newhref = \\"https://aemosgidev05:4503/content/forms/af/besco/indexlanding/landingpagenov19a.html?uid=\\" + vEamid;\\nconsole.log(\\"newhref: \\"+newhref);\\n\\n//document.location.href=\\"https://aemosgidev05:4503/content/forms/af/besco/indexlanding/landingpagenov19a.html\\";//bb oct20;\\n\\n//Nov16\\n\\ndocument.location.href=newhref;//bb oct20;\\n\\n\\n//document.location.href=\\"http://aemosgidev04:4502/content/forms/af/besco/indexlanding/landingpagenov9a.html?uid=qwerty\\";\\n\\n//Besco Nov20 not sure if below is working...\\n//guidelib.util.GuideUtil.navigateToURL('/content/dam/formsanddocuments/besco/indexlanding/landingpagenov19a/jcr:content?wcmmode=disabled'\,'_self');\\n\\n\\n"\,"event":"Click"\,"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.btShowLocalStorageAndJump"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]

fd:scripts.fd:init: [{"script":{"field":"guide.guideRootPanel"\,"event":"Initialize"\,"model":{"nodeName":"EVENT_SCRIPTS"}\,"content":"var uid = location.search.split(\\"uid=\\")[1]; // UID from URL\\nEAMID.value = uid;\\n//sessionStorage.setItem(\\"EAMID\\"\, uid);\\nsessionStorage.setItem(\\"eamid\\"\, uid);\\nconsole.log(\\"Root Panel init\, uid: \\"+uid);\\n\\n//var valuelang = \\"en-CA\\";\\nconsole.log(\\"EAMID.value: \\"+ EAMID.value);\\n//sessionStorage.setItem(\\"EAMID\\"\, EAMID.value);\\n\\n//besco-Nov9\\n//localStorage.setItem(\\"localEamID\\"\, uid);\\n// Test\\n//var x = localStorage.getItem(\\"localEamID\\");\\n//console.log(\\"localStorage.localEamID - x: \\"+x);\\n// End Test\\n\\n//var eamid = localStorage.getItem(\\"localEamID\\");\\n//http://aemosgidev04:4502/content/dam/formsanddocuments/besco/indexlanding/landingpagenov17a/jcr:content?wcmmode=disabled\\n//var newhref = \\"https://aemosgidev04:4502/content/dam/formsanddocuments/besco/indexlanding/landingpagenov17a/jcr:content?wcmmode=disabled&uid=\\" + eamid;\\n/*\\nvar newhref = \\"https://aemosgidev05:4503/content/forms/af/besco/indexlanding/landingpagenov9a.html?uid=\\" + eamid;\\nconsole.log(\\"newhref: \\"+newhref);\\ndocument.location.href=newhref;//Redirect;\\n*/"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]
